dimension:
36 5/8 x 4 7/8 in. (93.03 x 12.38 cm) (including fringe)
2 1/4 in. (5.72 cm) (fringe)
13 1/2 in. (34.29 cm) (object part, ties)
title: Head Wrap
description: lined in patterned print; geometric cross stitch embroidery at center in reds and green, black, white; top and bottom has applied tape--embroidered floral pattern--red, green, yellow, black; lower tape covers applied fringe tape--green fringe; two woven tape ties--blue and pink
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
